author: craigmcc
msg: Add a new classloader (used both by the bootstrap class and for webapps)
that extends URLClassLoader instead of doing everything itself.  At the
moment, there are two restrictions (compared to the previous
* When checking for auto-reload, only unpacked classes in the
WEB-INF/classes directory are checked (not JAR files in WEB-INF/lib).
* Resources loaded via ClassLoader.getResourceAsStream() are not cached.
This class loader will become the basis for implementing the ability to
run web apps directly out of the WAR file, as well as supporting the new
servlet 2.3 requirements related do JAR version checking.
